title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and analyze existing art curation platforms.

title: System Architecture Design
description:
Design the overall system architecture for AIArtCurator. This includes AI model, data pipeline, user interface components, and infrastructure. Prioritize scalability, performance, security, maintainability, and ensure a comprehensive solution by involving various stakeholders in the design process. Propose modular and extendable designs that allow for future enhancements while prioritizing collaboration, usability, and accessibility. Regularly update the design based on user feedback and technological advancements. Once approved, delegate task-decomposition to task-decomposer.

Additionally, consider implementing a robust testing strategy for quality assurance (QA) and ensure that the system is accessible to users with different abilities. This may involve collaborating with the QA tester and technical writer roles. To further streamline the process, liaise with the project manager for aligning the design with overall project goals.

Lastly, consider incorporating the following recommendations:
1. Use open-source AI frameworks to optimize costs and leverage community support.
2. Implement monitoring and logging systems for continuous improvement and issue resolution.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train the AI model for art analysis and curation based on the defined requirements.

title: Data Pipeline Implementation
description: Implement the data pipeline for ingesting, processing, and storing art data from various sources.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the art curation platform, including artist and user portals.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing art data, user profiles, and curation results.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures, such as authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to protect user data and art assets.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components and perform thorough testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring tools.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the art curation platform.
